data.title: Remove default from switch with enum, so that compiler warns.
Add VS Code folder to .gitignore to prevent #410
Update link to rmw API docs
Don't assume a DDS-based implementation in function docs
a couple of typo fixes for doc section. (backport #391)
a couple of typo fixes for doc section.
Fix ugly overwritten warning messages on error paths.
Fix arg name in rmw_take_response() doc
get_zero_initialized_xxx functions return zero initialized structure.
add rmw_get_default_xxx to return the structure with default values.
Initialize the NULL strucutre with static value.
definition of local means being in the same context.
Add a note about asynchronicity of discovery.
Improve handling of dynamic discovery - rmw changes (Extends #338)

Change the system default depth to 1.
